line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Waits for $quantity of freight dones to return
* or optionally if $quantity is 0 then it waits for all drones to return.
* TODO: Fix small but unlikely possibility of long loop here (1 hour stall)
* If cargo bay is full the drones can't be reclaimed properly since there would be no place to put them.
* Current code allows for this to be fixed eventually since the life of the drone will expire and the
* script will enforce a self-destruct to prevent an infinite loop. Good enough for version 1.1
* Restart the next stalled drone in the list, it is important that we stagger these so that is why the entire list is not restarted.
* Unfortunately fixing stalled drones takes time.
* We need to wait a few seconds before we reissue the order.
* Check for stalled freight drones, must be stopped for about 15 seconds before we recall.
* We dont want the drone to immediately start back.

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Waits for $quantity of freight dones to return
or optionally if $quantity is 0 then it waits for all drones to return.
TODO: Fix small but unlikely possibility of long loop here (1 hour stall)
If cargo bay is full the drones can't be reclaimed properly since there would be no place to put them.
Current code allows for this to be fixed eventually since the life of the drone will expire and the
script will enforce a self-destruct to prevent an infinite loop. Good enough for version 1.1
Restart the next stalled drone in the list, it is important that we stagger these so that is why the entire list is not restarted.
Unfortunately fixing stalled drones takes time.
We need to wait a few seconds before we reissue the order.
Check for stalled freight drones, must be stopped for about 15 seconds before we recall.
We dont want the drone to immediately start back.
